title: LangAI
description: Question-Answer app where user can ask questions about a text file ,done using Open-AI api and langchain.

title: PixShare
description: Social media App ,with features to post images ,comment on posts ,add friends,as well as feed which sorts out posts from friends etc.

title: Gmeet
description: A video Chat app made using WebRTC and socket.io ,with integrated chatting feature using Firebase, and Google sign-in using Google-Oauth2.
